programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac ; -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o noise.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 2
FLpanel "noise", 200, 50, -1 , -1 gkbeta, gislider1 FLslider "kbeta", -1, 1, 0, 5, -1, 180, 20, 10, 10 FLpanelEnd FLrun
instr 1 iamp = 0dbfs / 4 ; Peaks 12 dB below 0dbfs print iamp
a1 noise iamp, gkbeta printk2 gkbeta outs a1,a1 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Play Instrument #1 for one minute. i 1 0 60 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
